menu: Use this menu to access your Analyses, Apps and Data or to return to Dashboard from anywhere within the DE. Click to open the menu.
analyses:
Use the Analyses View to find information about the analyses (jobs) you have launched.

In the Analyses View, you can:

  • Check the status of analysis.
  • Access the results of your analyses.
  • View the parameters you set for each analysis.
  • Relaunch an analysis using all of the options (parameters) you previously selected.
apps:
Use the Apps View to view and find apps to analyze your data.

In the Apps View, you can:

  • Browse for all available apps in CyVerse.
  • Customize an existing app.
  • Create a new app and request to be made available in the DE for public use.
data:
Use the Data view to manage your data in our cloud-based, central repository called the CyVerse Data Store.

  • You can transfer data in/out of CyVerse.
  • Access data you own, data shared with you, and public data from anywhere in CyVerse.
  • Share your data with other CyVerse and external users.
notifications:
Automated notifications let you track progress of actions, such as:

  • The status of your analyses, data transfers, and any requests you have made.
  • Sharing of files and folders with you or by you.
preferences:
Use the Preferences to customize settings for your DE experience.

  • Customize notification preferences.
  • Change settings and modify keyboard shortcuts.
bag:
Use a bag to perform bulk operations.

  • Share Analyses, Apps, and Data from the bag.
  • Download multiple data sets from the bag.
dashboard:
Use Dashboard to find information about:

  • Recently launched analyses.
  • Recently used Apps.
  • New Apps published in the DE.
  • CyVerse New and Events.
search:
Use Global Search to:

  • Type 3 or more characters to quickly search and find Analyses, Apps and Data.
  • Filter search results by type.
  • View detailed results page by hitting the `Enter` key followed by the search term or selecting the `View All` from the results.
support:
Use this in-app chat to

  • Contact CyVerse support when you encounter issue(s) with the DE or any Cyverse products.
  • Ask a question about the DE or any Cyverse products.
  • Get notified about Cyverse planned maintenance and unplanned downtimes and events such as webinar.
tourPrompt: Welcome to CyVerse. Do you like to take a tour of the Discovery Environment?
